title: Behind the flyways
creator_credit: Rex Gary Schmidt and United States. Fisheries and Wildlife Service
brief_description: This film illustrates how data is gathered on the North American continent for use in making water-fowl regulations. Depicts all types of water-fowl hunting. Shows biologists and other personnel making field studies from Mexico to the Arctic on land, water and in the air. Explains how the information obtained is used in developing regulations.
